title: Automatically deleting masteries?
body:
Has anybody else had a problem had a problem with their masteries automatically deleting themselves?

This has happened to me about 5 times in the last few days and im sick of having to redo all of my mastery pages because it's a really tedious process and very unnecessary. Is there anything I can do to prevent it?

Thanks in advance for anyone who can help me.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This definitely sounds odd, as mastery pages are tied to your account these days.

Perhaps your account is compromised, have you noticed any unusual games in your match history that you don't recall playing? I recommend changing your account password and the password to your email account that is tied to the account (If the same as your league password)

If this continues to occur however and you're sure there are no signs of compromise then you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
